name: Child's Eye
description:
In this game you play a child that is at home but since his mother just went to work he isn't the happiest child alive.

Home just doesn't feel like home without the ones you love. That's why he decides to go look for his mother.

We wanted to make it so that throughout the level the player/child has to face fears that are only real to children.

For example, by making it so that the child can only walk on the white lines of the crosswalk since the rest is lava, obviously!

We really wanted to utilize the fact that for a child everything can be anything, a banana can be used as a revolver.

MADE WITH <3 IN 48H DURING GLOBAL GAME JAM 2019
